text: Pamela Hayden (born November 28, 1953) is an American actress and voice actress.She is best known for providing various voices for the animated television program The Simpsons. She is the voice of characters including Rod Flanders, Jimbo Jones, and Milhouse Van Houten. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:actors from Maine
title: Pamela Hayden
